lines.gurmukhi: jYsy jl iml dRum sPl nwnw pRkwr; cMdn imlq sb cMdn subws hY [

Unknown.translation: Just as all trees and plants yield many types of fruits and flowers by their union with water, but the nearness with sandalwood makes the entire vegetation fragrant like sandalwood.

Sant Sampuran Singh.translation: ijvyˆ jl nUM imlx kr ky ibRC nwnw pRkwr dy Plwˆ nwl Plvwn huMdw hY, Aqy cMdn dI vwSnwˆ nUM iml ky auh swrw cMdn dI sugMDI vwlw ho jwˆdw hY[

lines.gurmukhi: jYsy iml pwvk Frq pun soeI Dwq; pwrs prs rUp kMcn pRkws hY [

Unknown.translation: Just as union with fire melts many metals and on cooling remains the metal that it was, but when touched with philosopher's stone, that metal becomes gold.

Sant Sampuran Singh.translation: ijvyˆ A`g nUM iml ky Dwq Fl jwˆdI hY, iPr TMFI hox qy auho Dwq hI rihMdI hY pr pwrs nUM Cuh ky sonw rUp ho ky pRkwSdI hY[

lines.gurmukhi: Avr nKqR brKq jl jlmeI; sÍwNiq bUMd isMD iml mukqw ibgws hY [

Unknown.translation: Just as rain falling outside the specific period (Nakshatra) according to the position of stars and planets is just falling of water drops, but when it rains during Swati Nakshatras, and a drop falls on the oyster in the sea, it becomes a pearl.

Sant Sampuran Singh.translation: hornwˆ nC`qRwˆ ivc vrsdw vrKw dw jl qwˆ jl rUp hI rihMdw hY, pr sÍwˆiq nC`qR ivc brsI bUMd is`p nUM iml ky moqI ho pRkwSdI hY[

lines.gurmukhi: qYsy privrq AO inivrq jo sÍBwv doaU; gur iml sMswrI inrMkwrI AiBAwsu hY [603[

Unknown.translation: Similarly, engrossed in maya and liberated of maya's influence are two tendencies in the world. But whatever intentions and inclinations one goes to the True Guru, he acquires the trait of worldly or divinely accordingly.  (603)

Sant Sampuran Singh.translation: iqvyˆ jigAwsUAwˆ ivc do suBwv hn privrqI qy inivrqI so ijs suBwv vwlw jigAwsU gurU pws jwˆdw hY sMswrI jwˆ inrMkwrI, Apxy suBwv Anuswr pRp`kqw pRwpq krdw hY ]603]
